name: QLORB
description: QLORB is a puzzle game designed to take the simplicity of games like tetris and deconstruct it into something familiar but different. With QLORB, 2 sets of blocks must merge into 1 perfect block. In order for this to be accomplished the player must clear away all of the blue blocks so the red blocks have room.
minimum_requirements: OS: Win 7 32-bit or Better Processor: 2.0 ghz or higher Memory: 500 MB RAM Graphics: 500 Megs VRAM DirectX: Version 9.0 Storage: 500 MB available space
